content: --अर्थः {1} the meaning of a word. {2} a thing or object. {3} a head or topic (of which the Naiyāyikas enumerate 16 sub-heads). {4} anything which can be named ( अभिधेय), a category or predicament; the number of such categories, according to the Vaiśeṣikas, is seven; according to the Sāṃkhyas, twentyfive (or twenty-seven according to the followers of Patañjali), and two according to the Vedāntins. {5} the sense of another word which is not expressed but has to be supplied.
